result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Milton T. Plummer

defendant.name: Plummer, Milton T.
defendant.address: 115 Tower St., Apt. 114, Prairie du Sac, WI 53578

records.addlTxt:
9:59 AM Defendant Milton T. Plummer in court.  Atty Masana also appears w/the DE.  Prosecuting attorney Natalia J Gess in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states case and appearances noting Atty Masana has filed a motion to withdraw noting a conflict in this case.  Atty Masana is requesting he be allowed to withdraw.  Court will allow Atty Masana to withdraw and new counsel will be appointed.  Court appoints Atty Taylor Hart - (608) 355-2000.  Payments to continue as previously ordered.  Atty Masana notes he does think a PH will need to be held once Atty Hart is on board but notes he may not agree w/that.  Court will reset PH out a ways so Atty Hart has time to catch up w/the case.  Bond continued.
Preliminary hearing and Arraignment scheduled for December 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing and Arraignment on December 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
of Attorney's Fees ..to Peter Masana for services from July 30, 2022 - October 24, 2022

1:32 PM Prosecuting attorney Rick C Spoentgen in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Milton T. Plummer in court.  Attorney Peter Michael Masana in court for Milton T. Plummer.  Atty Masana requests a preliminary hearing and pre-trial.  Matter reset.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Pre-trial conference on September 16, 2022 at 11:15 am.

1:32 PM Defendant Milton T. Plummer in court.  Court reviews financial information.  Court finds conditionally indigent.   Court appoints Attorney Peter Masana, 128 2nd Avenue, Baraboo, WI 53913 (608) 448-4109 @$100/hr and reimbursement @ $100.00/month commencing September 1, 2022.

records.addlTxt: Indigency hearing on July 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
No contact with A.I.B. or his residence or place of schooling

2:48 PM Prosecuting attorney Natalia J Gess and intern Dan Moon in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Milton T. Plummer appeared by video, in custody.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin appeared by video.  DE doesn't qualify for PD appt.  Defendant received and waives reading of complaint.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalties.  Advised of rights to an attorney.  State makes bail argument requesting $300 cash w/no contact provision.  Atty Dolch responds.  Time limits waived for preliminary hearing.  $1,500.00 signature bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  No contact with A.I.B. or his residence or place of schooling.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Return date scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
